subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tony Romo once again looked like a quarterback Dallas could trust in a playoff run, completing 22 of 29 passes for 278 yards and 2 touchdowns as the Cowboys defeated the Falcons on Saturday night.
snippet: Tony Romo once again looked like a quarterback Dallas could trust in a playoff run, completing 22 of 29 passes for 278 yards and 2 touchdowns as the Cowboys defeated the Falcons on Saturday night.
